data.name: Jylko: Through The Song Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
You have access to all the music on YouTube for free, but if you want, you can support the project by buying the original soundtrack of Jylko: Through The Song. There will be added tracks in the future, with different styles.
Music is very important to me, and making music for a video game was a real challenge. It's really different than creating music from scratch. It had to fit the game.
I hope you enjoy the game and the music.
Again, this pack is for people who want to support the project, if you just want the music, they are available for free!
Thanks for your support.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space
